member.name: UI_ANIMATION_IDLE_BEHAVIOR
member.summary: Defines the behavior of a timer when the animation manager is idle.

member.name: UI_ANIMATION_IDLE_BEHAVIOR.UI_ANIMATION_IDLE_BEHAVIOR_CONTINUE
member.summary: The timer continues to generate timer events (is enabled) when the animation manager is idle.

member.name: UI_ANIMATION_IDLE_BEHAVIOR.UI_ANIMATION_IDLE_BEHAVIOR_DISABLE
member.summary: The timer is suspended (disabled) when the animation manager is idle.
